content:
https://connectathon.ihe-europe.net/montreux-2022

"We all came out to Montreux
On the Lake Geneva shoreline
To make records with a mobile
We didn't have much time"

Hello! New to the community and a CS student (discovered FHIR last night). I'm interested in using FHIR to possibly connect case management software used by legal professionals to EHRs. If anyone knows of any resources that might be helpful for this or anything , please share. So far, I've just started trying to go over the documentation and watched videos from Asymmetrik on YT.
